com.example.cshare.webservices

Interface OrderAPI


  • public interface OrderAPI
    Interface that defines the order-related API endpoints.

    Provides endpoints to retrieve ordered products, to order a product, to cancel an order or to confirm receipt of the product.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Clara Gros, Babacar Toure

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      retrofit2.Call<Product> cancelOrder(java.lang.String token, int productID)
      Returns a Call object that contains the response to the API's cancelOrder request.
      retrofit2.Call<Product> deliverOrder(java.lang.String token, int productID)
      Returns a Call object that contains the response to the API's deliverOrder request.
      retrofit2.Call<ProductListResponse> getOrderedProducts(java.lang.String token, int page)
      Returns a Call object that contains the response to the API's getOrderedProducts request.
      retrofit2.Call<Product> order(java.lang.String token, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> productID)
      Returns a Call object that contains the response to the API's order request.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrderedProducts

        @GET(value="order/")
retrofit2.Call<ProductListResponse> getOrderedProducts(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                                            java.lang.String token,
                                                                            @Query(value="page")
                                                                            int page)
        Returns a Call object that contains the response to the API's getOrderedProducts request.
        Parameters:
        token - (String) of the form "token eyJ0eXAiOiAianFsZyI6ICJIUzUxMiJ9", it corresponds to the token of the authenticated user and it is passed in the request header
        page - (int) number of the page to display (query parameter in the url)
        Returns:
        (Call) A Call object containing a product list and pagination information in a ProductListResponse object
        See Also:
        ProductListResponse, CartDataSource

      • order

        @POST(value="order/")
retrofit2.Call<Product> order(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                    java.lang.String token,
                                                    @Body
                                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> productID)
        Returns a Call object that contains the response to the API's order request.

        Performing form-urlencoded requests using Retrofit (through the annotation @FormUrlEncoded) will adjust the proper mime type of your request automatically to application/x-www-form-urlencoded

        Parameters:
        token - (String) of the form "token eyJ0eXAiOiAianFsZyI6ICJIUzUxMiJ9", it corresponds to the token of the authenticated user and it is passed in the request header
        productID - (int) ID of the product to order (request body)
        Returns:
        (Call) A Call object containing the ordered product in a Product object
        See Also:
        Product, ProductRequestManager.order(int)

      • cancelOrder

        @DELETE(value="order/{id}/")
retrofit2.Call<Product> cancelOrder(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                                 java.lang.String token,
                                                                 @Path(value="id")
                                                                 int productID)
        Returns a Call object that contains the response to the API's cancelOrder request.
        Parameters:
        token - (String) of the form "token eyJ0eXAiOiAianFsZyI6ICJIUzUxMiJ9", it corresponds to the token of the authenticated user and it is passed in the request header
        productID - (int) ID of the product to order passed in the url
        Returns:
        (Call) A Call object containing the product of the deleted order in a Product object
        See Also:
        Product, ProductRequestManager.deleteProduct(int)

      • deliverOrder

        @PATCH(value="order/{id}/")
retrofit2.Call<Product> deliverOrder(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                                 java.lang.String token,
                                                                 @Path(value="id")
                                                                 int productID)
        Returns a Call object that contains the response to the API's deliverOrder request.
        Parameters:
        token - (String) of the form "token eyJ0eXAiOiAianFsZyI6ICJIUzUxMiJ9", it corresponds to the token of the authenticated user and it is passed in the request header
        productID - (int) ID of the product to order passed in the url
        Returns:
        (Call) A Call object containing the delivered product in a Product object
        See Also:
        Product, ProductRequestManager.deliver(int)
